text:
I asked Nick Chubb today what he's looking forward to the most heading into the #Browns regular season. 

He gave me three answers: 

1. Getting back on the field with his teammates. 
2. Getting wins. 
3. Seeing Demetric Felton on the field.

text:

text:
Gary Brightwell looked good out of the backfield last night as a receiver.
